title: (x) North River - Sanvito {Yves}
content: Yves, don't you mean [Sanvito](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524130152/http:/www.adobe.com/type/browser/P/P_1730.jhtml)? (You even put it in the subject for the thread.)
author: Mark Simonson

comments.content: Nevermind. For some reason, your replies after 2:12 didn't show up until after I replied. Weird.
